occupation: Director of Business Development & Buzz Marketing at Circa Resort & Casino Las Vegas
headline: Director of Business Development & Buzz Marketing.   .      .     .      .     .      .      .     .    .    .   .   . Circa Resort & Casino Las Vegas
summary:
Originally from Toronto, Canada, Wilk has called Las Vegas home for more than 16 years. He has held positions with premier Strip properties ranging from Executive Director of Player Development to Vice President of Marketing, Customer Development, PR, Social Media and Operations of Casino/Nightlife/Beach Club. No stranger to the Las Vegas Nightlife landscape, Wilk has helped opened two major nightclubs and helped transform a third.  Richard is now Director of Business Development and Buzz Marketing at the new Circa Resort & Casino Hotel located in Downtown Las Vegas.

This casino and nightlife veteran brings a wealth of expertise to any venture he touches. With a solid background in marketing, branding and networking, he has built strong relationships with countless individuals ranging from celebrities, athletes, musicians and gamblers to Fortune 500 corporations and blue chip brands such as Microsoft, 4INFO, Affliction Clothing, the Hard Rock Hotel & Casino Las Vegas and Mandalay Resort Group, among others.

Richard has a solid reputation in the business and gaming sectors and is constantly sought out for his successful accomplishments in driving brand awareness and implementing effective, innovative strategic marketing, social and traditional media relations and entertainment programs.  

Richard was an advisor at 4INFO, the largest mobile advertising platform in the U.S., as well as a founding advisor at Palindrome Advisors, a not-for-profit organization. In 2011, Wilk became a founding advisor in PLYFE, the consumer facing universal digital rewards platform built on game mechanics tied to digital activities. Richard, in 2004, founded TWG (The Wilk Group) and used his networks to generate strategic partnerships, garnering success for his clients.

His success has been chronicled in such print and broadcast media outlets as  BBC, Discovery Channel, FOX, LIFE, People Magazine, Travel Channel, Casino Player Magazine, Vegas Magazine and VH1, to name a few.

Specialties: Strong Networking Capabilities, Marketing, Branding, Management, Communications, Great Customer Service, Creating Strong Relationships.

Trained in High Level Security & Protection.
Counter Terrorism & Intelligence Specialist.
Co-owned & operated an Executive Protection company that provided the highest levels of security to high profile clients including  Bill Gates, Microsoft, former President Bill Clinton, Eagles, Aerosmith, former VP Al Gore and The Rolling Stones.

experiences.description: Responsible for facilitating growth, sales and marketing strategies that result in revenue generation. Manages business development, strategic partnerships and takes care of high profile casino clients from customer development, to building strong relationships. Implements effective industry and media relations to help create a BUZZ. Maximizes public exposure opportunities and increases media excitement with expert social media management. Builds and ensures the growth of a dynamic brand.

experiences.title: Founding Advisor
experiences.description:
The days of static, staid content are behind us. 
We crave interaction; with content, with each other, with the digital world. Plyfe helps you turn your online content into a dialogue to rise above the digital noise with powerful tools, engaging experiences and valuable insights.
Our platform allows you to create, manage and distribute digital content in minutes by leveraging today’s most popular digital mechanics such as swipe l/r, social galleries, personality quizzes and more. Whoever your audience—fans, friends, followers—get them involved with Plyfe. 

Made in NYC by a team that believes life online should be as fulfilling as life offline. 
Play Life...

experiences.title: Founding Advisor
experiences.description:
Palindrome Advisors partners with non-profits and NGOs to help them effectively communicate with their supporters and the public at large. Using social and mobile media, we develop strategies and customized materials and technologies that increase awareness, build community, and drive donations for these important issues.

  --  Ben Paul, the Executive Director of After-School All-Stars, and one of Palindrome’s first nonprofit partners, commented that “Palindrome is a dream come true for the nonprofit landscape. It allows nonprofits to interact not just with the industry’s best talent but also with the technology, culture and innovation that comes with that talent.”

Making a difference where it counts the most!

Follow us on twitter at @palindromeadv, on Facebook (@Palindrome Advisors), or at www.palindromeadvisors.org

I am very Proud to be a Palindrome Founding Advisor.

experiences.title: Advisor
experiences.description: Founded in 2004, with a consistent track record of innovation and reliability, 4INFO is a diversified mobile advertising, media, and technology company that reaches millions of mobile consumers daily and touches them billions of times a month. AdHaven by 4INFO, recently spun out as its own division, is the industry's first mobile audience platform and network. The AdHaven Mobile Audience Platform includes a next-generation mobile ad server with the most advanced targeting capabilities in the mobile advertising industry, and the AdHaven Audience Network. 4INFO originated the first mobile optimized search engine for SMS, and still offers an array of consumer services and an enterprise-class SMS publishing platform. 4INFO is headquartered in San Mateo, CA with offices in New York, Los Angeles, Chicago and Boston. Learn more at http://www.4info.com.

experiences.title: Co-Founder and President
experiences.description:
Networking, Creating Strategic Partnerships, Brand Development, Strategic Marketing, Management, Consulting, Las Vegas Influencer, Speaker and Advisor. 

Richard Wilk has been an advisor at 4INFO, the leading SMS, Mobile advertising media company. He also is a founding advisor at Palindrome Advisors, a not-for-profit organization that links other non-profits with executive-level leaders who give back through a number of programs.

experiences.title: Consultant, Business Development and Communications
experiences.description: Developing and building new business relationships and synergies with major brands. Strategic Marketing and Communications through branding and networking. Directing Social Media, Public Relations and creating a fresh, cool BUZZ

experiences.title: Vice President of Player Development
experiences.description:
Richard is doing what he does best- taking care of gamblers and visitors to Las Vegas at the newly renovated Tropicana as it makes its mark again on the Las Vegas Strip. Wilk is proving to everyone that there is another great option to explore in the world of casinos and hotels. He has what it takes to make things happen and is the very best at taking care of people. Some say he's so genuine about it that it must be wired into his DNA! He manages and teaches the casino host team how to be more productive, generate more revenue while maintaining the highest level of customer service possible.
Wilk provides his clients with some of the most memorable experiences of their lives. Throughout his career he has built a strong network of trust with the rich and famous.
 Richard Wilk is definitely someone you need to know if you're coming to Las Vegas.

experiences.title: Vice President Nightlife Operations and Marketing
experiences.description:
Recently transitioning from his successful Casino Career into the Vegas Nightclub scene and helping open and market two of Las Vegas's major clubs in the past 9 months has been given the responsibility of Vice President at the all New Tropicana Hotel and Casino. Wilk is now Vice President of all Nightlife/Daylife Marketing and Operations for Club Nikki and Nikki Beach (soon to be re-named). Wilk is no stranger to the Vegas Nightclub scene. He will handle all aspects of the Nightclub and Beach Club. In addition all Corporate Events are welcomed, great deals with vip treatment by Richard. 

No one will treat you better in Vegas then Richard Wilk and now he has a full staff with the same direction, one direction..treat everyone like a VIP!!

experiences.title: Vice President Customer Development & Marketing
experiences.description: Wilk helped open Chateau Nightclub and Gallery Nightclub in two major hotels on the Las Vegas strip. He was responsible for overseeing a team of 30 Vip Hosts, marketing, public relations, social media and customer development.

experiences.title: Executive Director Customer Development
experiences.description:
Richard was sought after by the CEO, from the Hard Rock Hotel & Casino in Las Vegas,  to take care of the gamblers, celebrities, athletes and musical artists from around the world.  He used his networking skills to build strong relationships with some of the biggest names in Hollywood.  Additionally, he arranged certain one-of-a-kind events/performances, and was instrumental in handling special requests and travel arrangements for VIPS wanting to visit.  Wilk created a huge BUZZ, which in turn generated great PR and branding opportunities for the property. These creative events were seen by millions worldwide driving curiosity to the Hard Rock Hotel and Casino brand for many years!
 
Richard was also tasked in directing and managing a strong casino marketing team consisting of Casino Hosts, Executive Casino Hosts and Player Development Directors. Well known for his outstanding customer service, he led the team in implementing the highest levels of customer service possible while increasing casino revenues.

recommendations:
Melinda Filstrup



I’ve had the pleasure of knowing Richard Wilk at the Hard Rock Hotel & Casino Las Vegas and he never cease to impress me with his dedication and work ethic. He is motivated, creative, and charismatic with everyone he meets. It’s no wonder that every project he puts his mind to turns into a success. I highly recommend him to any company seeking a professional asset, or as a mentor to anyone up and coming in the industry. Richard is the who's who of Las Vegas with numerous connections and  celebrity outreach like no other. Richard has also become a close friend during the years. He would be a great asset to any company.

Adam Sheldon Seid



One of the top people I have had the pleasure to work with in the nightclub and venue branding arena.   Richard is a great person to deal with.  He has leadership abilities and overall people skills with tremendous vision.
